title: Sprint delivered solid adds, but investors should keep looking at churn - Barlacys' Amir Rozwadowski
text:
Sprint delivered solid adds, but investors should keep looking at churn - Barlacys' Amir Rozwadowski 2:48am GMT - 04:10 
Sprint is able to finance its own network improvements and its 5G plans are innovative, says Amir Rozwadowski, telecom analyst at Barclays. He also hints that it would be beneficial for Sprint to leverage global influence of its owner, Softbank. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
